title.rendered: Amber Heard: Leaving Johnny Depp For a Woman?!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

It’s only been six months since Johnny Depp and Amber Heard tied the knot in a secret ceremony on his private island, but we’ve already heard every type of bizarre rumor about their May-December marriage.

And we mean every type of rumor, from the predictable (Johnny drinks too much, and it’s driving Amber away.) to the downright bizarre. (Depp and Heard smuggled their dogs into Australia and nearly faced a criminal trial as a result.)

Now, sources are saying the marriage is in trouble for reasons that have nothing to do with Captain Jack-syle rum guzzling or covert ops involving yorkie terriers.

Prior to meeting Depp, Amber was in a relationship with a woman, and insiders are claiming that Amber still has an eye for the ladies – and Johnny apparently doesn’t see how amazing that is.

“Johnny’s terrified and doesn’t know what to do,” says one source.

According to Star magazine, Depp allowed Amber to continue swimming in the lady pond when they first started dating, but he put the kibosh on all that awesomeness once they got married. 

Heard has reportedly been seeing iO Tillett Wright on the side for several years. Sources say Johnny abruptly stopped being cool with the relationship sometime in the past few months, which ironically brought Heard and Wright closer together. 

Heard has said in interviews that “the potential of losing [her] freedom” was her biggest fear about getting married, and now it seems like Depp is locking her down like some sort of square, silk-scarved dad.

We’re sure she’s sick of him constantly borrowing her jewelry, too.

Amber Heard Photos: Through the Years

VIEW GALLERY
